reviews.review_msg: Extremely knowledgeable and well educated. Seems tough but see through that to her humourous side and you will enjoy the class. Don't be intimidated by her she's really very amusing..

Excellent Teacher, Funny, Cynical, extremely interesting. He really excels at making the class feel good when they are participating. He is a teacher I will remember 20 years down the line. He even helped me like Aristotle or should I say persuaded me to like Aristotle?
